arts.ttl: Keven Schlotterbeck's last-gasp header seals 11th hour victory for Augsburg over resilient Heidenheim
arts.sum: Augsburg secured a crucial 2-1 win over Heidenheim in a tightly-contested Bundesliga match complete with dramatic late goals and impressive goalkeeping. Chrislain Matsima and Keven Schlotterbeck were on the scoresheet for Augsburg, eclipsing Patrick Mainka's second-half equaliser for the visitors.

After losing six in a row, Heidenheim have started 2025 in better fashion with a win, loss and a draw to sit in the relegation play-off spot. FCA have won their last two away games to take the press...

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Heidenheim preview: Visitors hoping to end winless away run
arts.sum: Heidenheim will attempt to claim their first Bundesliga away win since September when they travel to the WWK Arena for Saturdayâ€™s meeting with Augsburg.

arts.ttl: Masaya Okugawa returns to Japan after nine years in German and Austrian football
arts.sum: FC Augsburg have officially closed the Bundesliga chapter of Japanese attacking midfielder Masaya Okugawa.

arts.ttl: Preview: Augsburg vs. Heidenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and Heidenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
